participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, Emily enjoys engaging with children and exploring new hobbies.
participant_1.background: i am fluent in english spanish and french. i am an elementary school teacher. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm interested in photography and like taking pictures.

participant_2.background: i will be released in about a month. i am currently in a juvenile detention center. i feel old. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.
